600px){.ckdc-popup-header{margin:0}.ckdc-popup-line{display:none}.ckdc-popup-footer{display:block;min-width:10em}.meter-popup-wrapper{width:42vw}.rating-votes-nr{width:28%}.rating-votes-meter{width:52%}}@media screen and (max-width: 399px){.meter-popup-wrapper{width:42vw}}@media screen and (max-width: 399px){.two-column .meter-popup-wrapper,.three-column .meter-popup-wrapper{width:65vw}}.language-suggestion{position:absolute;width:100%}.language-suggestion a{background-color:#f2f2f2;text-align:center;display:block;padding:0
